code: import actionType from"./acitonType";export var setCurSongId=function setCurSongId(sid){return{type:actionType.SET_CUR_SONG_ID,sid:sid};};export var isPlay=function isPlay(flag){return{type:actionType.PLAY,flag:flag};};export var acAlbum=function acAlbum(flag){return{type:actionType.SET_ALBUM,flag:flag};};export var playAlbum=function playAlbum(songs){return{type:actionType.PLAYLIST_ALBUM,songs:songs};};export var loading=function loading(flag){return{type:actionType.LOADING,flag:flag};};
